unnormalised: Arrey bhai, UPI mhantlear khorea arthaan game changer! Mhunnge hanvem ₹50 office-achea laginch-chea tea chai walak PhonePe vaprun zaite zale, 2 second-anchea bhitor dile.
normalised: Arrey bhai, U-P-I mhantlear khoree game changer! Hanv mhojea office lagichea tea chai walak rupia pon'nas PhonePe vaprun don secondam bhitor dile.
text: Arrey bhai, UPI mhantlear khorea arthaan game changer! Mhunnge hanvem ₹50 office-achea laginch-chea tea chai walak PhonePe vaprun zaite zale, 2 second-anchea bhitor dile.
